block.p: CANZONERI-Josephine. On October 8, 2000. Devoted wife of the late Thomas; Loving mother of Catherine Lazansky and Matthew Canzoneri; Adored grandmother of Elyse, Charles and Thomas Lazansky, Guy and Marc Canzoneri; Devoted great-grandmother of Teddy and Zoe Krewtzer, Michael, Albert, Ernie, William, Harry and Vito. Visiting Tuesday 2-4 and 7-9 pm John Dormi & Sons, 1121 Morris Park Avenue, Bx. Mass, Wed. 10:30AM, St. Clare's Church. Interment St. Raymond's Cemetery.
